code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import io from'socket.io-client';import Tabuleiro from'./components/Tabuleiro';import somDado from'./sounds/dice.mp3';import somComprar from'./sounds/comprar.mp3';import somPrisao from'./sounds/prisao.mp3';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io();function App(){const[dado,setDado]=useState(1);const[mensagem,setMensagem]=useState('');const audioDado=new Audio(somDado);const audioComprar=new Audio(somComprar);const audioPrisao=new Audio(somPrisao);useEffect(()=>{socket.on('dado',valor=>{setDado(valor);});socket.on('mensagem',msg=>{const texto=typeof msg==='string'?msg:JSON.stringify(msg);setMensagem(texto);if(texto.includes('comprou'))audioComprar.play();if(texto.includes('prisÃ£o'))audioPrisao.play();});},[]);const jogarDado=()=>{audioDado.play();socket.emit('jogar_dado');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',padding:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Monopoly RJ \uD83C\uDFB2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tabuleiro,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'2rem',margin:'20px 0'},children:["\uD83C\uDFB2 ",dado]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:jogarDado,children:"Jogar Dado"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginTop:10},children:mensagem})]});}export default App;
